{"id":917840574,"question_id":2662,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"11 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1679196117,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"20 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/917840574/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Check Knight Tour Configuration","memory":"27.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int dx[8] = {-1, 1, 2, 2, 1, -1, -2, -2};\n    int dy[8] = {-2, -2, -1, 1, 2, 2, 1, -1};\n    bool checkValidGrid(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        int x = 0, y = 0, n = grid.size(), cnt = 0;\n        if(grid[x][y]) return false;\n        while(cnt < n * n - 1){\n            int flag = 0;\n            for(int k = 0; k < 8; k++){\n                int tx = x + dx[k], ty = y + dy[k];\n                if(tx > -1 && tx < n && ty > -1 && ty < n){\n                    if(grid[tx][ty] == cnt + 1){ cnt++, flag = 1, x = tx, y = ty; break;}\n                }\n            }\n            //cout << cnt << ' ' << x << ' ' << y << endl;\n            if(!flag) return false;\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"check-knight-tour-configuration","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
